name: scratchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A scratchy record, etc. has scratches on it so it makes unpleasant noises when it is played: We spent the evening listening to her scratchy old jazz records.
Scratchy clothes are rough and uncomfortable.
If a part of your body such as your throat or eye feels scratchy, it feels dry and uncomfortable. : Lemon tea is good for soothing a scratchy throat. Styes can cause a scratchy sensation on the eyeball.
mainly UK A scratchy pen does not write easily and without interruption: This pen's scratchy. Do you have another one?
Scratchy drawings or lines are made with quick, rough marks: His strange scratchy drawings intrigue kids. The illustrator normally works with scratchy lines and a full, cheerful range of colours.
